snippet: BP said that it will sell its Texas City refinery and other assets to Marathon Petroleum for $2.5 billion, as the British oil company nearly finishes up an aggressive plan to pare back assets.
abstract: BP said that it will sell its Texas City refinery and other assets to Marathon Petroleum for $2.5 billion, as the British oil company nearly finishes up an aggressive plan to pare back assets.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: BP to Sell Texas City Refinery to Marathon Petroleum
